bio:
Hello, I'm Anna, a passionate front-end developer with a keen eye for details, I strive to create responsive websites that deliver seamless functionality. My interest in being a web developer sparked when I was on a vocational course for IT Technician. I completed a few courses on Udemy platform and took a 9-month Web Developer Bootcamp by Kodilla. As a problem solver, I enjoy translating design concepts into interactive and user-friendly web pages. I continuously seek to expand my skills and I enjoy learning new things. I'm excited to embark on new projects and collaborate with like-minded individuals and teams to create exceptional web experiences. If you have a project or opportunity you'd like to discuss, please feel free to get in touch.

Here are a few technologies and tools I've been working with recently:

projects.title: Bike Market
projects.desc: Mini market app where you can register with your e-mail or google account, add/edit/delete listing for new/used bikes and their components + message users about specific item.

projects.title: FFXIV Armory
projects.desc: App where you can search for player characters from FFXIV game and get some details on them thanks to the XIVAPI.

projects.title: Movie Reviews App
projects.desc: Movie list where you can add/edit/delete review and rating to each individual title. App is connected to the JSON server which is hosted on Vercel.

projects.title: To-Do App
projects.desc: To-do app that features adding, editing, deleting, filtering and drag'n'dropping tasks. The data is stored in local storage.

projects.title: Advice Generator App
projects.desc: Random advice generator using the Advice Slip API.

projects.title: Rock-Paper-Scissors
projects.desc: Simple rock-paper-scissors game in vanilla JS.
